questions.paragraph: Compare communication in ants with communication in humpback whales.
popup: Ants communicate through scents, while humpback whales communicate through singing.

questions.paragraph: Bats do not have strong eyesight like owls, yet they can hunt their prey at night. Mention the reason.
popup: Due to their exceptional hearing, bats can locate their prey using echolocation.

questions.paragraph: The owl's bowl-shaped head, who does it help hear what it cannot see?
popup: effectively directing far sounds towards its ears.

questions.paragraph: What happens if the components of the nervous system do not integrate and function individually?
popup: the person cannot take the appropriate response at the right time.

questions.paragraph: What happens if the Egyptian jerboa has a long response time
popup: Unable to survive and will be at risk of extinction.
